member.name: T:BallisticSolutions.BsEquations
member.summary: Provides ballistic equations.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.BsEquations.Displacement``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes displacement under constant acceleration.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: Elapsed time.
Initial velocity vector.
Constant acceleration vector.
member.returns: The displacement vector after has elapsed.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.BsEquations.Position``1(Godot.Vector4,``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes position after elapsed time under constant acceleration.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: Initial position vector.
Elapsed time.
Initial velocity vector.
Constant acceleration vector.
member.returns: The position vector after has elapsed.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.BsEquations.Time``1(Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes all possible interception times between a projectile and a moving target.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The direction of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: A sorted array of all valid interception times (t > 0). Empty if interception is impossible.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.BsEquations.Time``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)

The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.BsEquations.Velocity``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes the firing velocity required to hit the target at a given interception time.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The time until interception (must be positive).
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: The required firing velocity vector. Returns Vector.NaN if ≤ 0.

member.name: T:BallisticSolutions.BsPosition
